title: Before they were Famous: Australian filmmakers at school
abstract: Student works from some of Australia's most celebrated filmmakers.
description: Everyone has to start somewhere....... This program offers a collection of nine short films made by students who went on to become well known Australian filmmakers, working locally and on the international stage.  The program includes student works by: Phil Noyce ('Rabbit Proof Fence'), Sarah Watt ('My Year Without Sex'), Shirley Barrett ('Love Serenade'), Sue Brooks ('Japanese Story'), P.J. Hogan ('My Best Friends Wedding'),  Jane Campion ('The Piano'), Cate Shortland ('Somersault'), Chris Noonan ('Babe'), and Gillian Armstrong ('My Brilliant Career').
